description.displayText:
I hired Brenda to care for my mother when I had to return to work full-time. Brenda helped keep my mother on a schedule for her medications, meals and daily activities. She also assisted my mother with daily household chores such as cleaning, bed making and laundry. My mother also enjoyed that they did activities together such as word search competitions, watching tv shows and reading the same novels to have conversations about. 

I would hire Brenda again in a heartbeat should I need someone to care for a member of my family.
description.originalText:
I hired Brenda to care for my mother when I had to return to work full-time. Brenda helped keep my mother on a schedule for her medications, meals and daily activities. She also assisted my mother with daily household chores such as cleaning, bed making and laundry. My mother also enjoyed that they did activities together such as word search competitions, watching tv shows and reading the same novels to have conversations about. 

I would hire Brenda again in a heartbeat should I need someone to care for a member of my family.

description.displayText: She is a very caring individual. She paid attention to my needs and what the doctor advised needed to be done. She was hired to help me take care of myself and my household after I had back surgery. Should I have another surgery or know someone who needs assistance I would definitely recommend they contact Brenda to see if she is available as their every need would be met in a kind and respectful manner.
